description: Details required by Condition 8 (Construction Management Plan) of Planning Permission 22/00144/FUL(Demolition of existing bungalow and erection of new two storey house with associated landscaping, parking provision, cycle storage and refuse/recycling facilities).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The details submitted are insufficient to support the discharge of Condition 8 (construction management plan) of Planning Permission 22/00144/FUL.The submitted Construction Phase Health and Safety Plan cannot be accepted as a substitute for a highways-focused Construction Management Plan. The level of detail provided in terms of parking, access, loading/unloading, materials storage and traffic/pedestrian management is either non-existent or insufficient. These details must be included and illustrated in a traffic management plan drawing.It is also noted that Appendix E (Site Plan) of the submitted document is missing.
